title: Navigating Indonesian Law as a Digital Nomad or Expat: Finding Expertise at Baker McKenzie

The firm's team of experienced lawyers possesses in-depth knowledge of Indonesian law, coupled with global expertise in corporate, litigation, and tax matters.  ## Corporate Services for Digital Nomads  As a digital nomad or expat, you may be operating a business or managing personal affairs in Indonesia. Baker McKenzie can provide valuable support with various corporate services, including:  *   Setting up and registering your company *   Drafting contracts and agreements *   Advising on tax compliance and optimization *   Providing guidance on employment laws and regulations  ## Tax Expertise for Expats  Navigating Indonesian tax laws as an expat can be particularly challenging. Baker McKenzie's team of tax experts is well-versed in the complexities of Indonesian tax law, offering personalized advice on:  *   Residency status and tax implications *   Income taxation and withholding obligations *   Value-added tax (VAT) and sales tax compliance  ## Litigation Services for Disputes  In the event of a dispute or legal issue, Baker McKenzie's litigation team is equipped to provide robust representation and strategic guidance.
